title: Clinical depression
description: A mental health disorder characterized by persistently depressed mood or loss of interest in activities, causing significant impairment in daily life.

title: Anxiety disorder
description: A mental health disorder characterized by feelings of worry, anxiety, or fear that are strong enough to interfere with one's daily activities.

title: Bipolar disorder
description: A disorder associated with episodes of mood swings ranging from depressive lows to manic highs.

title: Dementia
description: A group of thinking and social symptoms that interferes with daily functioning.

title: Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder
description: A chronic condition including attention difficulty, hyperactivity, and impulsiveness.

title: Schizophrenia
description: A disorder that affects a person's ability to think, feel, and behave clearly.

title: Obsessive compulsive disorder
description: Excessive thoughts (obsessions) that lead to repetitive behaviors (compulsions).

title: Autism
description: A serious developmental disorder that impairs the ability to communicate and interact.

title: Post traumatic stress disorder
description: A disorder in which a person has difficulty recovering after experiencing or witnessing a terrifying event.
